short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The best software to auto post to Facebook Groups with ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The best Facebook marketing tool to auto post to Facebook groups and get more exposure. 

LeadMachine Posts allows you to schedule and auto post on Facebook groups and pages organically. 

Schedule your posts once and LeadMachine Posts will keep posting to all the selected groups and pages one by one to save you a lots of time while getting more done.
